summary: Add a standalone follower to the game based on companions of jorrvaskr available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP body
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=6]Belial the Wolf[/size][/size][size=3]

Add a standalone follower to the game based on companions of jorrvaskr
available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP body
[/size]
[size=3]Name: Belial the Wolf
Race: Nord
Body: CBBE Vanilla & UNP
Voiced: Female Even Toned

Essensial: False
Marrigable: True
Morality: Any Crime

Class: Warior 1H
Stats: Levels 25 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health and Stamina
Combat Style: Companions

Outfit: [size=3]Companions[/size] Armor
Inventory: Banded Iron Shield
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

Weapon: Skyforge Steel Sword
Stats: Vanilla
Craftable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]
Upgradeable: [size=3]Vanilla[/size]

[size=3][b][b]Location:
[/b][/b]Mead hall of jorrvaskr
